name: Piranha Media
overview:
Piranha Media is a full-service performance marketing agency providing brand advertisers with customized and effective online advertising campaigns that yield proven results. Through our suite of performance-driven services, Piranha Media is able to develop an online marketing plan that will help drive leads and increase sales.

Established in 2008, Piranha Media delivers complete campaign development, distribution, monetization and optimization of CPA (Cost Per Acquisition/Action), CPL (Cost Per Lead), CPM (Cost Per Thousand), Social Media and SMS/Text messaging programs through Millionaire Network, an elite team of publishers

Company was co-founded by Parker Powers, an entrepreneur and leader in the performance marketing industry, and Bryan Wiznuk “Wiz”, one of the top affiliate marketers in North America, in Burleson, Texas, a suburb of Dallas-Fort Worth. Their vision was simple: to develop a network of the most elite, successful and well-respected affiliate marketing publishers from around the world to help companies increase product and services sales.

Both Parker and Wiz were passionate that Piranha Media stay far removed from any form of Can Spam fraudulent play with client brands and finances. Four office openings later and now partnered with over 100 employees and publishers, the company has remained untarnished by legal issues and continues to drive extremely successful campaigns with strong ROI case studies for both large and small companies.
